question: Which country started the construction of world's largest optical telescope?
explanation: Chile started the construction of the world's largest optical and infrared telescope. It was inagurated by Chilean President Michelle Bachelet, and it is located at the Paranal Observatory in the Antofagasta region. The telescope will be constructed at a 3,000 meter-high mountain in the middle of the Atacama desert. The telescope is scheduled to commence its operations in 2024.
